name: Third Person Shooter 3D
description:
I made this game to learn the mechanics of "Third Person Shooter 3D"  with Configure topology, which the player must find a way to finish the game. This games is a story of a Policeman assigned to save his friend who locked by the enemy in the fence, this policeman must find a way how to open the fence because the fence is impassable. After the police managed to open the fence, it turned out that his friend was seriously injured which required the police to immediately look for 3 medkits to save his friend and finish the game. 

In this game the player is required to find a yellow key to open the fence and save friends, as well as find the key to open the gate to the forbidden forest and looking for 3 medkits that will be used to save his friend who was seriously injured.

The character assets that I use are assets that I downloaded from https://www.mixamo.com/#/
